div.p:
Antonio:
Wow, that information is really interesting, and it might be surprising to a lot of people.

Michelle:
Yeah, the research lets us know we don’t need to have emotional problems in order to develop alcoholism or drug addiction.

Antonio:
So, earlier, we made a list of the types of person most people would say would develop alcoholism. Are any of them accurate?

Michelle:
Well, while there's no addictive personality type that causes alcoholism, research identified several personality traits that are more common among people who do.

Antonio:
Okay. I’m really curious to see what they are.
